name: .45 caliber conversion kit
description: This conversion kit replaces several key parts of a 9mm, .38, .40 or .44 pistol firearm to rechamber it for .45 caliber pistol ammunition.  The conversion results in reduced accuracy and increased recoil.

name: suppressor
description: An universal silencer modification for many pistols, SMGS, and rifles. Using a suppressor is almost an imperative in zombie-infested regions. Gunfire is very noisy, and will attract much undesired attention. The drawback is a reduced muzzle velocity, resulting in less accuracy and damage.

name: enhanced grip
description: An ergonomic grip modification designed to enhance parts on many shotguns, sub machine guns, or rifles. This grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control and accuracy. Aside from the increased weight, there are no drawbacks to this modification.

name: barrel extension
description: A modification that will extend the barrel of many sub machine guns and rifles. A longer barrel increases the muzzle velocity of a firearm, contributing to both accuracy and damage. However, the longer barrel tends to vibrate and push back harder after firing, greatly increasing recoil.

name: shortened barrel
description: A modification that will shorten the barrel of many SMGs and rifles. A shortened barrel results in markedly reduced accuracy, and a minor increase in noise, but the improved manageability of the firearm reduces recoil greatly.

name: rifled barrel
description: A modification that will add a rifled barrel to many shotguns. Rifling a shotgun barrel is mainly done in order to improve its accuracy when firing slugs. The rifling makes the shotgun less suitable for shot, however.

name: extended magazine
description: A modification for many pistols, shotguns, SMGs, and rifles. This kit will increase the ammunition capacity of your firearm by 50%, but it adds bulk, and the weight will reduces your accuracy slightly.

name: double magazine
description: A modification for many shotguns, SMGs, and rifles. This kit will double the ammunition capacity of your firearm, but it adds a lot of bulk, and the extra weight will reduces your accuracy.

name: spare magazine
description: A spare magazine modification, which can be used in many pistols, shotguns, SMGs, and rifles. A spare magazine can be kept on hand to make reloads faster, but must itself be manually reloaded before it can be used again.

name: brass catcher
description: A modification for shotguns, SMGs, and rifles. A mesh, heat resistant bag that hangs off the side of your gun over the ejection port and catches ejected casings after firing, so you don't have to pick them up.

name: gyroscopic stabilizer
description: A gyroscopic stabilizer modification for many SMGs and rifles. An advanced unit that straps onto the side and connects into the part of the magazine of your firearm. It reduces vibration, greatly reducing recoil after firing and increases accuracy.  However, it also takes up space in the magazine slot, reducing effective ammo capacity.

name: rapid blowback
description: A rapid blowback modification for many SMGs and rifles. This improved blowback mechanism decreases friction on the sliding action of the bolt after firing, chambering the next round more quickly and ultimately makes your firearm's automatic fire much faster. However, the faster fire rate increases recoil, dispersion, and noise.

name: auto-fire mechanism
description: An auto-fire conversion modification for many pistols. This simple mechanism kit converts a pistol to a fully-automatic weapon by replacing the striker fire mechanisms. To maintain control, it's preset to fire a burst size of three rounds. However, the increased rate of fire reduces accuracy, and increases noise and recoil.

name: 9mm caliber conversion kit
description: A conversion kit for many pistols and SMGs. This will replace several key parts of a .38, .40, .44 or .45 firearm rechambers it to a 9mm firearm.  The conversion results in a slight reduction in accuracy.

name: .22 caliber conversion kit
description: A conversion kit for many pistols, SMGs, and rifles. This will replace several key parts of a 9mm, .38, .40, 5.7mm, 4.6mm, 7.62mm or .223 firearm rechambers it to accept .22 ammunition. The conversion results in a slight reduction in accuracy.

name: 5.7mm caliber conversion kit
description: A proprietary conversion kit from FN Hestal, used to rechamber .22, 9mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 5.7x28mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.

name: 4.6mm caliber conversion kit
description: A proprietary conversion kit from Heckler and Koch, used to rechamber .22, 9mm, or .38 firearms to their proprietary 4.6x30mm, a round designed for accuracy and armor penetration.

name: .308 caliber conversion kit
description: This conversion kit is used to rechamber a shotgun or 7.62mm, .223 or .30-06 rifle to the popular and powerful .308 caliber. The conversion results in reduced ammo capacity and a slight reduction in accuracy.

name: .223 caliber conversion kit
description: This conversion kit is used to rechamber a shotgun or 7.62mm, .30-06, or .308 rifle to the popular, accurate, and damaging .223 caliber. The conversion results in slight reductions in both accuracy and ammo capacity.

name: battle rifle conversion
description: A complete conversion kit for many rifles, designed to turn it into a deadly automatic battle rifle variant. It replaces the magazine, bolt, and barrel to high quality military grade equivalents. The magazine will be extended, the rate of fire increased, and the damage capabilities will be improved. On the down side, the weapon will be louder and less accurate.

name: sniper conversion
description: A complete conversion kit for many rifles, designed to turn it into a deadly sniper rifle variant. It replaces the magazine, bolt, and barrel to high quality long range equivalents. This will sacrifice ammo capacity, and any automatic fire capabilities, but greatly increases accuracy and damage.

name: M203
description: A M203 grenade launcher modification kit for almost any rifle. This attaches a grenade launcher under the barrel of your rifle. It allows a single 40mm grenade to be loaded and fired. The M203 was originally designed for use with M16 variants but today can be attached to almost any rifle. Of course, it adds a bit of weight, but it's a good addition for crowd control.

name: 40mm pipe launcher
description: A homemade grenade launcher modification kit for almost any rifle. This attaches a grenade launcher under the barrel of your rifle. It allows a single 40mm grenade to be loaded and fired. Of course, it adds a bit of weight, and the grenades might not go exactly where you aim them, but it's a good addition for crowd control.

name: bayonet
description: A bayonet modification for many SMGs, rifles, and shotguns. This bayonet is a long, stabbing blade that can be attached to the front of a weapon, allowing a melee attack to deal piercing damage. However, the added length and weight increases recoil slightly.

name: pistol bayonet
description: A bayonet modification for many pistols. This bayonet is a short, stabbing blade that can be attached to the front of a handgun, allowing for a melee attack to deal piercing damage. However, the added length reduces the gun's overall handling somewhat, and you can't help but feel a bit silly looking at it.

name: underslung shotgun
description: A modification kit for many rifles. This attaches a miniturized pump action shotgun under the barrel of your rifle. It allows a total of two shotgun shells to be loaded and fired. It's good for the sudden switch from long range to short range, but at the cost of a slightly heavier weapon and added difficulty aiming.

name: masterkey shotgun
description: A modification kit for many rifles. This attaches a minimalist pump action shotgun under the barrel of your rifle. It allows a total of four shotgun shells to be loaded and fired. It's perfect for the sudden switch from long range to short range, but at the cost of a heavier weapon and added difficulty aiming.

name: rail-mounted crossbow
description: A modification kit for shotguns and rifles. This kit to attaches a pair of crossbow arms and a firing rail to the barrel of a long firearm allowing crossbow bolts to be fired. It adds a fair amount of weight, and makes steady aiming difficult, but now you get the best of the medieval and modern weaponry together.

name: laser sight
description: A laser sight modification for many pistols, SMGs, rifles, and shotguns. This is small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. As a bonus, it looks really cool during night fights. Aside from the increased weight, there are no other drawbacks to this modification.

name: improved iron sights
description: A iron sight modification for many pistols, SMGs, rifles, and shotguns. It replaces the stock sights with custom, high contrast match sights, making it easier to sight down the barrel. The end result is increased accuracy. There are no drawbacks to this modification.

name: red dot sight
description: A red dot sight modification for SMGs, rifles, and shotguns. This gun sight replacement allows the you to see a red target reticule over a target when aiming. It increases accuracy, but adds some weight to the weapon.

name: holographic sight
description: A holographic sight modification for SMGs, rifles, and shotguns. This gun sight replacement allows the you to see a lighted reticle superimposed on a target when aiming. Very popular with military forces, it greatly increases accuracy but is slightly heavier than a red dot sight.

name: rifle scope
description: A scope modification for rifles. This lower power rifle scope is used by civilians and military alike. It doesn't narrow your field of vision and helps you make pinpoint shots, at the cost of a little more weight on your weapon.

name: ported barrel
description: A barrel modification for many pistols, SMGs, rifles and shotguns. This modification attached to the end of the weapons barrel, and redirects exhaust gases to compensate for muzzle climb. This counteracts the weapons recoil, but increases noise and reduces accuracy slightly.

name: ergonomic grip
description: A grip modification for many pistols. This is set of custom ergonomic replacement furniture for a pistol. The comfortable handling improves recoil and accuracy. Aside from the increased weight, there are no other drawbacks to this modification.

name: adjustable stock
description: An adjustable replacement stock modification for SMGs, rifles and shotguns. This custom stock is telescoping and comes with an ergonomic shoulder brace, allowing it to fit you perfectly. The added control improves recoil and accuracy. Aside from the increased weight, there are no other drawbacks to this modification.

name: pistol stock
description: An add on extension stock for pistols which helps to control recoil and improve accuracy. Aside from the increased weight, there are no other drawbacks to this modification.

name: bipod
description: A bipod modification for many rifles. Bipods are commonly used on rifles and machine guns to provide a forward rest and reduce motion while prone. Aside from the increased weight, there are no other drawbacks to this modification.
